{"step_by_step_thinking": "Inhaled glucocorticoids are used to control and prevent symptoms in patients with asthma or COPD. Stopping these medications could lead to worsening of these conditions. There is currently no evidence to suggest that inhaled glucocorticoids increase the risk of contracting COVID-19 or worsen its outcomes. Therefore, patients should not be advised to stop these medications to prevent COVID-19.", "answer_choice": "B. no"}
